law.catch_line: A person may not ship goods to which he has no title or on which there is a lien or security interes...
law.text:
A person may not ship goods to which he has no title or on which there is a lien or security interest and transfer a negotiable bill of lading for the goods for value:
With intent to defraud; and
Without disclosing his lack of title or the existence of the lien or security interest.
